title: Serif that marries with Dax?
content:
Hi, can anyone give a suggestion for a serif face that marries with Dax?

Thanks!

 [‹ Font ID please.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080322021145/http:/typophile.com/node/43307 "Go to previous forum topic") [DETOX STRATEGY Type I.D. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080322021145/http:/typophile.com/node/43313 "Go to next forum topic")
author: malmethod

comments.content: Can you describe what you mean by “marries”? Choosing type is most importantly a matter of selecting typefaces that support your content and reach your audience. Tell us more about your project and we can give appropriate recommendations.
